title: Kes tappis Otto Mülleri?
overview: In Kes tappis Otto Mülleri?, a famous businessman and former Soviet wrestling star is found murdered in his manor on his 65th birthday. Detectives interrogate eight family members in turn, and dark truths about a successful and powerful man who once killed a wolf with his bare hands gradually come to light. Everyone has a story about Otto Mueller - and everyone has a motive.
